name: AR Physicalizations
description: Using Vuforia AR SDK, building a system for combining biogeochemistry data with physical geospatial models.

name: CPU Raytracer
description: A simple raytracer from scratch written in C++. Runs on up to two cores with multiple samples per pixel, and render primitive shapes as well triangle-based geometry.

name: Generative Adversarial Networks
description: A comparison of the CycleGAN and DualGAN algorithms for style transfer applications.

name: Yelp Rating Predictions
description: Applying the slope one algorithm to predict restaurant ratings, based on the Yelp Open Dataset .

name: Bucketz
description: An iOS game built with Swift and SpriteKit.

name: Path Planning Game
description: A simple interactive program demonstrating A* path planning and probabilistic roadmaps. Written in Java with Processing, which is based on OpenGL.

name: Particle Simulation
description: A simple particle system capable of complex behavior, such as billboarding, streaking, texturing, and more. Written in Java with Processing, which is based on OpenGL.
